= Add Friends =

== Actions ==

 * Add friends for the current user.

== Request ==
<table cellspacing="4" border="0">
 <tr><td>*URL*</td><td>[http://fabienrenaud.com/armp/www/addFriends.php]</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Method*</td><td>POST</td></tr>
 <tr><td>*Authentication*</td><td>Required.</td></tr>
</table>

Mandatory parameters:
 * facebookIds = _list of integers_ Integers have to be separated with *;*
 * facebookNames = _list of strings_ Strings have to be separated with *;*

Optional parameters:
 * _None_

== Response ==

That WS returns the default XML response. [WS_DefaultResponse More...]
